integer.name: foregroundValue
integer.label: Foreground Value
integer.description: An integer value that defines the label mask value that shoulb be adopted. This is useful for a multilabel input.

integer-vector.name: neighborRadius
integer-vector.label: Neighborhood Radius
integer-vector.description: A list of 3 values indicating the (x,y,z) size of the neighborhood. This should large enough in order to get the bounderie tissues present in the input image. The neighborhood is running over the contour of the input mask. Example: a radius of (1,1,1) creates a neighborhood of (3,3,3).

string-enumeration.name: approach
string-enumeration.label: Statistics Approach
string-enumeration.description: A list of approaches used to infer the closest object voxel in the neighborhood.
